headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Hershey (HSY) After Its Strong Recent Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Hershey is still fairly priced after its recent run, this article walks through what the current share price might be implying about the company’s value. Hershey’s share price closed at US$236.28, with returns of 6.5% over 7 days, 23.1% over 30 days, 29.5% year to date, 41.0% over 1 year, 7.7% over 3 years, and 77.2% over 5 years. These moves may have some investors reassessing both upside potential and risk. Recent coverage has continued to focus on Hershey as a...
